directions: Pulse yogurt, strawberries, water, powdered milk, banana, blueberries, raspberries, blackberries, and protein powder together in a blender until well-mixed. Add ice, sugar, and honey and blend until smooth.
ingredients: 1/2 cup nonfat vanilla yogurt (such as Dannon® Light and Fit®)
3 tablespoons turbinado sugar (such as Sugar in the Raw®)
title: Purple Power Punch Smoothie (My Kids' Fave)
